author: prebello
body:
change of RAW input dataset acc issue:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/24619

 140.56 and 140.57 wfs will use
/HIHardProbes/HIRun2018A-v1/RAW
/HIMinimumBiasReducedFormat0/HIRun2018A-v1/RAW, respectively, in the run 326479 with LS [1,23]

Local test with 10 events OK

FYI @fabiocos @mandrenguyen @zhenhu @paolo gunnelini
title: changing RAW input dataset for HI2018 wfs
